name: Don't Pee
description:
We've all been there. You drank too much before bed, and now you've woken up in the middle of the night with the urge.

The goal is simple. Get to the bathroom before you pee your pants.

It's just a simple game about not peeing your pants.

Sometimes, that's harder than it seems.


Features:

Riveting Storyline
Explorationg
A testament to self control.

You'll adventure through an atmospheric home, trying to find your way to your ultimate goal. The Bathroom.
You'll have to use your wits to solve puzzles, explore new areas, and try to survive.

With an advanced scared system that forces you to stay on your toes by pressing buttons as they appear.
